input.sentences: i got a new video game which appeared to be a sims-like game show type game .
i could make the characters do crazy things .
i could make some of them carry teddy bears .
sometimes if i was confused | i 'd just take a bird 's eye view of everything .
i think i might have put this guy in a jello shot .
output.sentences: The type of video game I like the most is role playing games, like The Sims.
I like making a bunch of crazy characters to experiment with.
One Sim I made was best friends with his teddy bear, which he always carried around.
Here's a birds eye view of a bunch of very confused Sims.
They're confused because they're watching a guy I put inside a jello shot.
